version_description: No features today, bugfixes only. Have a nice a day!

Sometimes you eat the bear, and sometimes the bear eats you.
Must See games removed. If you were the one who used the feature, please write us feedback.
Bugs destroyed
Africa Cup of Nations is coming, and this update has all you need to enjoy it.
Regular bugfixes inside. Just trying to stay perfect, you know.
A bunch of minor improvements here and there.
Some minor bugfixes to chats and ads. Nevermind.
A fair number of fixes and improvements for minor bugs and malfunctions you could be lucky not to notice.
Fixed some minor but nasty bugs while preparing a major update. Stay tuned, we've got some surprises for you.
One step closer to perfection.

• Find anything in an instant: the seach button is always down there, under your thumb
• Redesigned subscription: it's ringing bell instead of star now
• Redesigned scoreboard: dash instead of colon will help distinguish actual scores from times
• Redesigned line-ups: see how clear and concise they have become
• Redesigned video tab: nice and neat
• Improved sign-in: you will be signed on automatically upon registration
Some of you experienced crashes after a recent update — we fixed it.
Just some minor bugfixes, nevermind.
Fixed a nasty crash that occurred when loading video. Enjoy.
Minor bugfixes, nevermind.

Top news of the day are now available in the match center! Tap on any of them for more details or on the News header to get the full list. (If you don't fancy reading the news, just collapse this block as you would do with any tournament.)

Also, several nasty bugs have been fixed - for example, the player's pop-up on the line-ups screen works properly and displays his stats in a game.

- You can now report a video that doesn't exist or is in fact from another match. There's a button for that, let us know if there's something wrong with it.
- Line-ups became a little better: playing numbers now don't interfere with long surnames, game stats in the pop-up now differentiate between field players and goalkeepers.
- Minor bugfixes in the 'Latest news' block

- We have improved news block and video tab.
- Bugfixes.
- All the news of your favorite teams, tournaments and players are always right at hand! If you have not added your favorite team to Favorites, it's time to do it.

Our app is a little bit better now - we have fixed some bugs in push-notifications and matches.
Enjoy live scores and stories about your favorite teams!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Updates for iPhone X
- Play-off stage design for World Cup
- Match center improvements

- new "pregame form" widget for teams
- minor visual updates in match center
- bugfixes
